required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of a Live-attenuated Vaccine Against Respiratory Syncytial Virus in Elderly Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, First in Human, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of the CodaVax-RSV Vaccine in Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This Phase I trial will enroll 42 healthy adult volunteers. The study will enroll a sentinel group of 6 younger adults aged 18 to 49 years followed by approximately 36 healthy older adults aged 50 to 75 years. All participants will receive two doses, 28 days apart. The vaccine will be administered as nose drops to both the low and high dose cohorts.

primary_outcome.description: Counts of participants with local and systemic events along with symptom severity and duration
Percentages of participants with local and systemic events along with symptom severity and duration
Counts of participants with AEs not included as reactogenicity events
Percentages of participants with AEs not included as reactogenicity events
Number of medically-attended AEs (MAEs), new onset chronic illnesses (NCIs), and serious AEs (SAEs) will be captured

secondary_outcome.description: Titer of RSV-specific immunoglobulin G (IgG) antibodies measured by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) in serum
Percent of participants with at least 4-fold increase in RSV-specific IgG as measured by ELISA over baseline
Titer of neutralizing antibodies in serum measured via RSV micro neutralization assay

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent of patients seroconverting via neutralizing antibodies
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of participants with at least 4- fold increase in neutralizing antibodies in serum over baseline
Geometric mean titer (GMT) of antibodies measured by ELISA in nasopharyngeal (NP) swab specimens

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent of patients seroconverting via IgA
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of participants with at least 4 fold increases in RSV-specific IgA over baseline

intervention.description: Codon deoptimized, live-attenuated vaccine against RSV delivered intranasally via dropper
